mainPackage

Class MainClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainPackage.MainClass

  • public class MainClass
extends java.lang.Object
    MainClass represents the class where entry point of the program (main function) can be found. Also there are some functions for checking the win state, moving the hero and running each task.
    Author:
    razvan

    • Method Detail

      • moveHeroToDirection

        private static boolean moveHeroToDirection(Hero hero,
                                           Maze maze,
                                           Direction direction,
                                           java.io.BufferedWriter fileWriter)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Move hero on a certain direction and put the new coordinates in a file.
        Parameters:
        hero - the hero, here Dubluve
        maze - the maze generated
        direction - next direction where hero should go
        Returns:
        if we have a win or keep finding the exit portal
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are problems while writing on file

      • checkWin

        public static boolean checkWin(Maze m,
                               Hero h)
        Check if the hero has reached the exit portal.
        Parameters:
        m - the maze
        h - the hero
        Returns:
        whether hero has reached the exit portal or not

      • runTask

        private static void runTask(int task,
                            Maze m,
                            Hero h,
                            java.io.BufferedWriter fileWriter)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Run a task given as parameter. It move the hero using AI or computing the shortest path to the finish. If the hero cannot reach the finish, a message will be printed.
        Parameters:
        task - the number of task
        m - the maze
        h - the hero
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The entry point of the program. It runs the task.
        Parameters:
        args - list of arguments, first argument is task number, second one is input file name and third one is output file name.
